name: openEO Platform (Eurac Research)
description: openEO Platform is a federated, cloud-based processing and analytics environment for Earth Observation data, enabling users to process and analyze EO data via a variety of interfaces including Python, R, and JavaScript clients. It provides access to large EO datasets and offers scalable processing from pixel to continental level. The platform is managed by a European consortium and is intended for researchers, developers, and analysts in the EO domain.
